rows.label: bf03180150_0010
rows.name:
Incredible.
Never heard of such a thing.

rows.label: bf03180150_0020
rows.name: It's all true.

rows.label: bf03180150_0030
rows.name: I just thought it was an accessory.

rows.label: bf03180150_0040
rows.name: As if that'd be the case!

rows.label: bf03180150_0050
rows.name:
Blades heal immediately 
no matter what wounds they receive.

rows.label: bf03180150_0060
rows.name: Unless their Core is destroyed or their Driver dies, they're immortal.

rows.label: bf03180150_0070
rows.name: However, you guys...

rows.label: bf03180150_0080
rows.name:
Well, nothing we can do about it
since this is how it is.

rows.label: bf03180150_0090
rows.name: This is troublesome.

rows.label: bf03180150_0100
rows.name:
At this rate, if either one goes down,
it's over, isn't it?

rows.label: bf03180150_0110
rows.name: A proper Driver protects their Blade, right?

rows.label: bf03180150_0120
rows.name:
Then I'll show you 
I can protect Homura.

rows.label: bf03180150_0130
rows.name: Easier said than done, kid.

rows.label: bf03180150_0140
rows.name: Vandham-san.

rows.label: bf03180150_0150
rows.name:
I've decided that I won't die again,
for Homura who gave me this life.

rows.label: bf03180150_0160
rows.name: I won't die. And we'll certainly reach Eden,

rows.label: bf03180150_0170
rows.name: together with Homura.

rows.label: bf03180150_0180
rows.name: Rex, you mean...

rows.label: bf03180150_0190
rows.name:
Going to Eden? 
I can't let that pass.

rows.label: bf03180150_0200
rows.name:
It's troublesome when mere side 
characters try to steal the spotlight.

rows.label: bf03180150_0210
rows.name: Isn't this ruining the script?

rows.label: bf03180150_0220
rows.name: Yoshitsune!

rows.label: bf03180150_0230
rows.name:
I have no recollection 
of allowing 
a traitor to use my name.

rows.label: bf03180150_0240
rows.name: Traitor traitor!â™ª

rows.label: bf03180150_0250
rows.name: So Nia-chan turns out to be quite the villain!

rows.label: bf03180150_0260
rows.name: Teeheehee!

rows.label: bf03180150_0270
rows.name: I didn't betray anyone!

rows.label: bf03180150_0280
rows.name:
Then why are you there?
Do you think that's where you belong?

rows.label: bf03180150_0290
rows.name: Hey, who are they?

rows.label: bf03180150_0300
rows.name: Probably Iira, the group that's after Homura.

rows.label: bf03180150_0310
rows.name: Iira, you say?

rows.label: bf03180150_0320
rows.name:
Yoshitsune,
why are you here?

rows.label: bf03180150_0330
rows.name: Well, the Holy Grail, of course.

rows.label: bf03180150_0340
rows.name:
I just had to come and see 
the leading lady with my own eyes.

rows.label: bf03180150_0350
rows.name: Shin put you up to this?

rows.label: bf03180150_0360
rows.name:
Well deduced.
Oh, by the way...

rows.label: bf03180150_0370
rows.name: Shin told me to do whatever I want with you.

rows.label: bf03180150_0380
rows.name: You understand what that means, right?

rows.label: bf03180150_0390
rows.name: Shin... You're lying!

rows.label: bf03180150_0400
rows.name:
Oh, shocked?
Don't tell me you thought he wouldn't abandon you?

rows.label: bf03180150_0410
rows.name: How naive can you be?

rows.label: bf03180150_0420
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Grrr!

rows.label: bf03180150_0430
rows.name: In any case, your part ends here.

rows.label: bf03180150_0440
rows.name: Now, please exit the stage together.

rows.label: bf03180150_0460
rows.name: Hnngh!

rows.label: bf03180150_0470
rows.name: Vandham-san?

rows.label: bf03180150_0480
rows.name:
Many Drivers have lost 
their lives at Iira's hands.

rows.label: bf03180150_0490
rows.name: Even our mercenary group isn't an exception.

rows.label: bf03180150_0500
rows.name:
They say their goal is stealing Cores...
So, if this Yoshitsune is one of them...

rows.label: bf03180150_0510
rows.name:
Yuu, Zuo!
Get the villagers to evacuate.

rows.label: bf03180150_0520
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: bf03180150_0530
rows.name: You ready?

rows.label: bf03180150_0540
rows.name: Ready!

rows.label: bf03180150_0550
rows.name: Got it!

rows.label: bf03180150_0560
rows.name: Sorry about this.

rows.label: bf03180150_0570
rows.name: No problem!

rows.label: bf03180150_0580
rows.name:
Listen up. His Blade Kamui can 
manipulate the ether energy in space.

rows.label: bf03180150_0590
rows.name:
She can instantly create a field that 
opposes whatever attribute we use.

rows.label: bf03180150_0600
rows.name:
In other words, an enemy we can't let 
our guard down against. Let's go!
